title: SION SPLASH WOW
body:
Hi I'm an OCE player named sneezee yes without a capital s.
Anyway I'm here to show you an amazing Sion splash art its not mine I just found it on the internet but I think riot should make it Sions splash art
http://leaguecraft.com/fan-art/view/1033-sion-splash.xhtml
there it is.

replies.body: Hi I can see whats wrong with the drawings but it mist be pretty hard to draw it so give the illustrator more respect

i have to admit its a great drawing and i can see why you would love it but its such a inaccurate drawing, sion has he's hair tied up, only one shoulder pad, has a massive red glowing hole in he's belly and he's axe is totally off, amazing drawing but to inaccurate to be a splash art
